text: Allah‌ ekhana tomadera bhara laghaba karalena ebam tini to abagata achena ye, tomadera madhye durbalata ache, kaje'i tomadera madhye eka’sa jana dhairyasila thakale tara du’sa janera upara bijayi habe. Ara tomadera madhye eka hajara thakale allah‌ra anujnakrame tara du hajarera upara bijayi habe. Ara allah‌ dhairyasiladera sathe rayechena
